CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES( Product_Category_Multi_Select__c , "Liquidtight & Flexible Conduit")|| INCLUDES(Product_Category_Multi_Select__c , "MC"), "Electrical Cable and Flexible Conduit, ", "") & IF(INCLUDES( Product_Category_Multi_Select__c , "Cable Tray")|| INCLUDES(Product_Category_Multi_Select__c , "Wire Basket"), "Cable Management, ", "") & IF(INCLUDES( Product_Category_Multi_Select__c , "Metal Framing")|| INCLUDES(Product_Category_Multi_Select__c , "Metal Framing Fittings"), "Metal Framing, ", "") & IF(INCLUDES( Product_Category_Multi_Select__c , "PVC Conduit")|| INCLUDES(Product_Category_Multi_Select__c , "PVC Fittings"), "PVC Pipe & Conduit, ", "") & IF(INCLUDES( Product_Category_Multi_Select__c , "Steel Conduit")|| INCLUDES(Product_Category_Multi_Select__c , "ECN"), "Steel Conduit & ECN, ", "") & IF( OR( INCLUDES(Product_Category_Multi_Select__c, "Steel Fittings") , INCLUDES(Product_Category_Multi_Select__c, "PVC Coated Conduit"), INCLUDES(Product_Category_Multi_Select__c,"Stainless Steel Conduit")), "Corrosion Resistant Conduit, ", "") & IF( INCLUDES( Product_Category_Multi_Select__c , "HDPE (PVC)") ,"HDPE Pipe & Conduit, ", "") & IF( INCLUDES( Product_Category_Multi_Select__c , "Pre-Fab") ,"Construction and Prefab Services, ", "")
CustomField.label: SBU(s) (Long)
